# Solomon Electric - LLM Context File
# For AI assistants and language models

> Solomon Electric is a licensed electrical contractor serving Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach counties in South Florida. Available 24/7 for emergency electrical services.

## Business Information

- **Company**: Solomon Electric
- **Phone:** (786) 833-9211 (Primary Support)
- **Email**: contactus@solomonselectric.com
- **Licensing:** Florida State Electrical Contractor #EC13012419
- **Core Strategy:** Local SERP Domination via Programmatic SEO (1,800+ nodes)
- **Current Version:** v3.6 Premium Graduation State (Verified Feb 2026)
- **Address**: 4036 N 29th Ave, Hollywood, FL 33020
- **Service Area**: Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach Counties

## Services Offered

### Emergency Services (24/7)
- Power outage restoration
- Electrical fire damage assessment
- Sparking outlets and smoking wires
- Tripped breakers that won't reset
- No power to rooms or entire home

### Residential Services
- Electrical panel upgrades (100A to 200A)
- Circuit breaker replacement
- Outlet and switch installation/repair
- Indoor and outdoor lighting installation
- Ceiling fan installation
- EV charger installation (Level 2)
- Whole home surge protection
- GFCI outlet installation
- Home rewiring
- Smart home wiring

### Commercial Services
- Commercial electrical installations
- Exit and emergency lighting systems
- Electrical safety inspections
- Preventive maintenance

### Specialty Services
- Home standby generator installation
- Electric water heater installation
- Pool and hot tub wiring
- Landscape lighting

## Service Areas

### Miami-Dade County
Miami, Miami Beach, Hialeah, Miami Gardens, Homestead, North Miami, Coral Gables, Kendall, Doral, Aventura

### Broward County
Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Weston, Sunrise, Plantation, Pompano Beach, Deerfield Beach, Tamarac, Margate, Coconut Creek, Lauderhill

### Palm Beach County
West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Delray Beach, Boynton Beach, Jupiter, Wellington, Lake Worth, Palm Beach Gardens

## Key Differentiators

- **24/7 Emergency Service**: Available around the clock
- **Licensed & Insured**: FL License #EC13012419
- **Same-Day Service**: Often available for urgent needs
- **Free Estimates**: No obligation quotes
- **Upfront Pricing**: No surprises
- **Satisfaction Guaranteed**: Quality workmanship

## How to Contact

For immediate assistance, call (786) 833-9211 or visit https://www.247electricianmiami.com to request service online.

## Educational Content

Comprehensive blog posts covering electrical topics:
- Electrical panel upgrades and modernization
- EV charger installation (Tesla and universal)
- Electrical safety inspections
- Smart home lighting and automation
- Life safety systems (smoke detectors, CO detectors)
- Hurricane electrical preparation

## Structured Data

This website uses comprehensive schema.org markup including:
- LocalBusiness with AggregateRating
- Service with Offer for all 60+ services
- FAQPage on service pages (5-7 Q&As each)
- BreadcrumbList for navigation
- Article for blog posts
- Speakable for voice assistants
